translated: This is the Saṅgha of the harmonious, and this is the Saṅgha of the disharmonious.

original: zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: How could it be like that?

original: thams cad spangs pa dang / thams cad rgyun bcad pas 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad spangs pa dang / thams cad rgyun bcad pas 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called the noble saṅgha because they have abandoned everything and cut the continuum of everything.

original: ming dang mtshan ma med pa /
analyzed: ming dang mtshan ma med pa /
translated: They are without name and sign,

original: tha snyad med pa /
analyzed: tha snyad med pa /
translated: without convention,

original: 'jug pa med pa /
analyzed: 'jug pa med pa /
translated: without engagement,

original: tha snyad rgyun chad pa de dag ni /
analyzed: tha snyad rgyun chad pa de dag ni /
translated: and without the continuum of convention.

original: mchog tu 'phags par brjod pa'i phyir dngos po de dag mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: mchog tu 'phags par brjod pa'i phyir dngos po de dag mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Because they are described as the highest nobility, those things are not observed.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: yongs su btags nas ming dang mtshan ma rnams kyi tha snyad dmigs par gyur na ni; lta bar gyur pa rnam pa du ma la chags pa yin te /
analyzed: yongs su btags nas ming dang mtshan ma rnams kyi tha snyad dmigs par gyur na ni; lta bar gyur pa rnam pa du ma la chags pa yin te /
translated: if the conventions of names and signs were observed through designation, then there would be attachment to the many kinds of views.

original: gang zhig srid pa 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa phung po'i 'du shes dang / phung po lnga la yongs su brten pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig srid pa 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa phung po'i 'du shes dang / phung po lnga la yongs su brten pa ni /
translated: The perception of the aggregates, which is the cause for the arising of existence, and the reliance on the five aggregates

original: log par lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log par lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the basis for wrong views.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su bzung ba nas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su bzung ba nas 'di lta ste /
translated: From the grasping of incorrect perception,

original: phung po'i 'du shes log par 'dzin pa dang / ngan song @26b la 'dzin pa dang / dmigs pa la 'dzin pa dang / lam gol nga la 'dzin pa dang / yang dag ba ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de ngag ni /
analyzed: phung po'i 'du shes log par 'dzin pa dang / ngan song @26b la 'dzin pa dang / dmigs pa la 'dzin pa dang / lam gol nga la 'dzin pa dang / yang dag ba ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de ngag ni /
translated: The noble śrāvakas do not have the notion of the aggregates, the notion of the lower realms, the notion of objects, the notion of a wrong path, or the notion of what is not true.

original: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la yod pa ma yin te; yang dag pa ma yin pa la dmigs pa khams gsum pa mi shes pa thams cad ma gtogs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la yod pa ma yin te; yang dag pa ma yin pa la dmigs pa khams gsum pa mi shes pa thams cad ma gtogs te /
translated: Except for the knowledge of all that is not true in the three realms,

original: des na / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
translated: they are called the noble saṅgha.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa sgra sna tshogs la zhen pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa sgra sna tshogs la zhen pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag ni /
translated: whatever attachment there is to various untrue sounds

original: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dmigs su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dmigs su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: does not exist in the noble saṅgha.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / mir 'dzin pa dang / mi ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / bud med du 'dzin pa dang / skyes par 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / mir 'dzin pa dang / mi ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / bud med du 'dzin pa dang / skyes par 'dzin pa dang /
translated: grasping at self, grasping at sentient beings, grasping at life force, grasping at person, grasping at human, grasping at nonhuman, grasping at female, grasping at male,

original: lhar 'dzin pa dang / dmyal bar 'dzin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'dzin pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'dzin pa dang / phung por 'dzin pa dang / khams su 'dzin pa dang / skye mched du 'dzin pa dang / 'byung bar 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: lhar 'dzin pa dang / dmyal bar 'dzin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'dzin pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'dzin pa dang / phung por 'dzin pa dang / khams su 'dzin pa dang / skye mched du 'dzin pa dang / 'byung bar 'dzin pa dang /
translated: grasping at god, grasping at hell, grasping at animal birth, grasping at the world of the Lord of Death, grasping at the aggregates, grasping at the elements, grasping at the sense sources, grasping at the elements,

original: 'jig par 'dzin pa dang / dung gi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rnga bo che'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / 'khar rnga'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rdza rnga'i sgar 'dzin pa dang / pi wang gi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / glu'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig par 'dzin pa dang / dung gi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rnga bo che'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / 'khar rnga'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rdza rnga'i sgar 'dzin pa dang / pi wang gi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / glu'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
translated: grasping at destruction, grasping at the sound of a conch, grasping at the sound of a great drum, grasping at the sound of a small drum, grasping at the sound of a clay drum, grasping at the sound of a lute, grasping at the sound of a song,

original: de bzhin du rol mo'i sgrar thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung @27a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du rol mo'i sgrar thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung @27a *//
translated: Likewise, they apprehend the sounds of all musical instruments, and the sounds of earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / lam gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / log pa'i lam gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dregs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / lam gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / log pa'i lam gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dregs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They apprehend the sounds of morality and immorality, the sounds of the path and the sounds of the wrong path, the sounds of pride and the sounds of afflictions,

original: rnam par byang ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / brgyad pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / brgyad pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
translated: the sounds of purification and the sounds of the afflictions, the sounds of concentration and the sounds of meditative stabilization, the sounds of meditative equipoise and the sounds of the eight liberations, the sounds of stream enterers and the sounds of once-returners,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rig pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rig pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa dang /
translated: the sound of a once-returner, the sound of a non-returner, the sound of an arhat, the sound of knowledge, the sound of liberation, the sound of attaining the result,

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrar 'dzin ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgrar 'dzin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrar 'dzin ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrar 'dzin pa ste /
translated: the sound of a buddha, the sound of the Dharma, the sound of the Saṅgha, the sound of nirvāṇa, and the sound of complete nirvāṇa.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sgra sna tshogs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sgra sna tshogs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni /
translated: these various sounds that are apprehended are not real.

original: don dam par 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam par 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: Ultimately, the noble hearers do not apprehend them.

original: de lta mod kyi /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi /
translated: However,

original: sgra sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs su 'dzin pa'i rnam pa du ma de dag ni /
analyzed: sgra sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs su 'dzin pa'i rnam pa du ma de dag ni /
translated: these various sounds and the many aspects of apprehending various sounds

original: shes pa gcig gi mtshan @27b nyid yin te /
analyzed: shes pa gcig gi mtshan @27b nyid yin te /
translated: It is the characteristic of a single cognition.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: It is without characteristics.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang mi mthun pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang mi mthun pa ni /
translated: Those who are averse to the absence of characteristics and the absence of signs

original: 'du shes phyin ci log tu zhugs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du shes phyin ci log tu zhugs pa yin gyi /
translated: are engaged in distorted perception.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni; 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni; 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
translated: Those who possess undistorted acceptance are called the noble saṅgha.

original: gang dag mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / kun tu chags pa med pa dang / gzung ba med ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pas ni /
analyzed: gang dag mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / kun tu chags pa med pa dang / gzung ba med ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pas ni /
translated: Those who are without characteristics, without signs, without attachment, without complete attachment, without grasping, without arising, and without cessation

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa yin no //🔽de la rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa gang yin pa de la ni /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa yin no // de la rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa gang yin pa de la ni /
translated: have undistorted acceptance.

original: sgom pa med /
analyzed: sgom pa med /
translated: In that, there is no cultivation,

original: rnam par sgom ba med /
analyzed: rnam par sgom ba med /
translated: no thorough cultivation,

original: rab tu skye ba med /
analyzed: rab tu skye ba med /
translated: no arising,

original: rlom sems med /🔽rnam par rlom sems med /
analyzed: rlom sems med / rnam par rlom sems med /
translated: no conceit,🔽no discrimination,

original: rnam par rlom sems ma yin pa med /
analyzed: rnam par rlom sems ma yin pa med /
translated: no nondiscrimination,

original: 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: 'gal ba med do //
translated: and no conflict.

original: de la ni /🔽tshu rol med /
analyzed: de la ni / tshu rol med /
translated: In that,🔽there is no near shore,

original: pha rol med /
analyzed: pha rol med /
translated: no far shore,

original: rtog pa med /
analyzed: rtog pa med /
translated: and no conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du so sor rtog par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du so sor rtog par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
translated: The noble Saṅgha is so called because it is the discernment of the characteristics of non-conceptuality.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'dus pa rnams kun tu bcad pas de'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa rnams kun tu bcad pas de'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya'o //

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar yang ngas chos mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang ngas chos mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: it is like this: whatever Dharma I see,

original: nga mthong ba yin no //🔽zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: nga mthong ba yin no // zhes gsungs pa /
translated: that is seeing me.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: nga ni / nam yang chos yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga ni / nam yang chos yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: I am never a Dharma.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar nga la gzugs kyi skur skyes bu gti mug lhas phyin dang / de bzhin du mu stegs pa gzhan dag gis kyang mthong @28a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar nga la gzugs kyi skur skyes bu gti mug lhas phyin dang / de bzhin du mu stegs pa gzhan dag gis kyang mthong @28a *//
translated: it is like this: other tīrthikas, such as the god of delusion, see me as a form body.

original: ste; sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: ste; sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs su mthong na mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: it is like this: if the Tathāgata is seen as form, that is not seeing.

original: sgras kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sgras kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not by sound,

original: de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and so on as before.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽it is like this:

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs kyi skur mthong nas mthong ngo //
translated: “The Tathāgata is seen in the form body.”

original: zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i tshigs de ni /
analyzed: zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i tshigs de ni /
translated: This statement

original: tshig gi ngo bo tsam du zad kyi /
analyzed: tshig gi ngo bo tsam du zad kyi /
translated: is just a verbal expression.

original: dris na yang dag par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dris na yang dag par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: If you ask, it is not right knowledge.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs su mthong na mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs su mthong na mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because those who see the Tathāgata as a form body do not see him.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽those who do not have the three—the characteristic, the sign, and mental activity—

original: gang zhig mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / yid la byed pa gsum med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad la rlom sems su mi byed /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: gang zhig mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / yid la byed pa gsum med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad la rlom sems su mi byed / mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: who do not have effort, who do not have cessation, who do not have arising, who do not have conceptual elaboration, who do not have conceit about all phenomena,🔽who do not have conceit about nirvāṇa,

original: mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: who do not have conceit because of nirvāṇa,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la dga' bar mi byed /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la dga' bar mi byed /
translated: who do not delight in nirvāṇa,

original: rtog par mi byed /
analyzed: rtog par mi byed /
translated: who do not imagine,

original: rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
translated: He does not conceptualize.

original: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig par mos pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig par mos pa ni /
translated: He has conviction in the sameness of all phenomena,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: which is to say,

original: mtshan nyid med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa nyid yin no //
translated: their lack of characteristics.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de lta bu yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de lta bu yin la /
translated: the Tathāgata is like that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'ang de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'ang de lta bu yin no //
translated: and seeing the Tathāgata is like that.

original: @28b de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: @28b de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is seeing the Tathāgata?

original: rtsol ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa ste /
analyzed: rtsol ba med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa ste /
translated: It is being effortless, free of conceptual elaboration, and unborn.

original: de ni / rtog pa med pa dang / zhen pa med pa dang / nges par 'dzin pa med pa dang / ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma ma yin pa med pa dang / mtshan ma'i las med pa dang /
analyzed: de ni / rtog pa med pa dang / zhen pa med pa dang / nges par 'dzin pa med pa dang / ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma ma yin pa med pa dang / mtshan ma'i las med pa dang /
translated: It is non-conceptual, non-fixated, non-grasping, nameless, signless, not even signless, and not even the activity of signs.

original: tha snyad du gzung ba med pa dang / btags pa'i las med pa yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad du gzung ba med pa dang / btags pa'i las med pa yin te /
translated: It is not apprehended in terms of conventions and is not even the activity of designations.

original: des na / dngos po med pa tha snyad kun tu chad pa de la rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: des na / dngos po med pa tha snyad kun tu chad pa de la rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Therefore, it is the absence of entities, the cessation of all conventions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i mchog yin no; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i mchog yin no; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Seeing the Thus-Gone One is the supreme sight.

original: gang mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas chos mthong ba gsungs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas chos mthong ba gsungs pa gang zhe na /
translated: Śāriputra, what is the Dharma that the Thus-Gone One has taught to be the sight by which one sees the Thus-Gone One?

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / tha snyad thams cad la rtag tu mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / tha snyad thams cad la rtag tu mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: It is the absence of marks, the absence of wishes, the absence of conceptual elaboration, the absence of appropriation, and the constant non-apprehension of all conventions.

original: de'ang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'ang 'di lta ste /
translated: And that is as follows:

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no //
translated: One does not falsely project even nirvāṇa.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: nga'ang mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su mi mdzad /🔽mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi mdzad /
analyzed: nga'ang mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su mi mdzad / mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi mdzad /
translated: I do not falsely project even nirvāṇa,🔽I do not falsely project through nirvāṇa,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dgyes par mi mdzad na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dgyes par mi mdzad na /

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga @45b rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong dang /

original: thob kyis 'jal ba dang / chos dang mi mkhan pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub la dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po nyams pa dang /

translated: exerting pressure, not being a Dharma practitioner, seeking gain through gain, the degeneration of the aggregate of discipline, the degeneration of the aggregate of insight, and the degeneration of the aggregate of liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po nyams pa dang / sangs rgyas la ma dad pa dang / chos la ma dad pa dang / dge 'dun la ma dad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang /
